skillDetails.name: Sheltered Nature
skillDetails.description: Aura: All Nature Monster in the party start the combat with a shield equal to 25% of their Max Health and receive 1% less damage for every 1000 Max Health.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: All Nature Monster in the party start the combat with a shield equal to 25% of their Max Health and receive 1% less damage for every 1000 Max Health.
